languages.text: "В первом же варп-перелете вместе с тобой на борту начала твориться какая-то чертовщина. Шепчутся, что причина — в тебе. Это так?"
"Strange and blasphemous things started happening during the first warp voyage with you on board. The crew are whispering that you may be the reason. Is this true?"
languages.original_text: "В первом же варп-перелете вместе с тобой на борту начала твориться какая-то чертовщина. Шепчутся, что причина — в тебе. Это так?"

traits.locale_text: "Strange and blasphemous things started happening during the first warp voyage with you on board. The crew are whispering you may be the reason. Is this true?"
"Strange and blasphemous things started happening during the first warp voyage with you on board. The crew are whispering you may be the reason. Is this true?"
"Strange and blasphemous things started happening during the first warp voyage with you on board. The crew are whispering that you may be the reason. Is this true?"
"Strange and blasphemous things started happening during the first warp voyage with you on board. The crew are whispering that you may be the reason. Is this true?"

languages.text: “你加入我们之后，我们在亚空间中的第一次航行就遇到了古怪的亵渎事件。船员们窃窃私语，说可能是你导致的，真的是这样吗？”
languages.original_text: "Strange and blasphemous things started happening during the first warp voyage with you on board. The crew are whispering that you may be the reason. Is this true?"

traits.locale_text: “你加入我们之后，我们在亚空间中的第一次航行就遇到了古怪的亵渎事件。船员们窃窃私语，说可能是你导致的，真的是这样吗？”

languages.text: «Durante el primer viaje por la disformidad con usted a bordo, empezaron a ocurrir sucesos extraños y blasfemos. La tripulación susurra que su presencia es la causa. ¿Pueden estar en lo cierto?».
languages.original_text: "Strange and blasphemous things started happening during the first warp voyage with you on board. The crew are whispering that you may be the reason. Is this true?"

traits.locale_text: «Durante el primer viaje por la disformidad con usted a bordo, empezaron a ocurrir sucesos extraños y blasfemos. La tripulación susurra que su presencia es la causa. ¿Pueden estar en lo cierto?».

languages.text: 「奇妙かつ冒涜的なことが、お前を載せての最初のワープ航行中に起こり始めたのだ。クルーたちは、お前がその原因ではないかとささやきあっているが、本当か？」
languages.original_text: "Strange and blasphemous things started happening during the first warp voyage with you on board. The crew are whispering that you may be the reason. Is this true?"

traits.locale_text: 「奇妙かつ冒涜的なことが、お前を載せての最初のワープ航行中に起こり始めたのだ。クルーたちは、お前がその原因ではないかとささやきあっているが、本当か？」

languages.text: "Während der ersten Warp-Reise mit Euch an Bord sind eigenartige, ketzerische Dinge geschehen. Die Crew flüstert, dass Ihr vielleicht der Grund dafür seid. Ist das wahr?"
languages.original_text: "Strange and blasphemous things started happening during the first warp voyage with you on board. The crew are whispering that you may be the reason. Is this true?"

traits.locale_text: "Während der ersten Warp-Reise mit Euch an Bord sind eigenartige, ketzerische Dinge geschehen. Die Crew flüstert, dass Ihr vielleicht der Grund dafür seid. Ist das wahr?"

languages.text: « Des phénomènes étranges et blasphématoires ont commencé à se produire lors de notre première traversée du Warp avec vous à bord. L'équipage semble croire que vous en êtes la cause. Est-ce le cas ? »
languages.original_text: "Strange and blasphemous things started happening during the first warp voyage with you on board. The crew are whispering that you may be the reason. Is this true?"

traits.locale_text: « Des phénomènes étranges et blasphématoires ont commencé à se produire lors de notre première traversée du Warp avec vous à bord. L'équipage semble croire que vous en êtes la cause. Est-ce le cas ? »

languages.text: "Aramıza katıldıktan sonra yaptığımız ilk öteboyut yolculuğunda günahkârlık dolu, tuhaf şeyler olmaya başladı. Mürettebattan tüm bunların nedeni olduğuna dair fısıltılar yayılıyor. Haklılar mı?"
languages.original_text: "Strange and blasphemous things started happening during the first warp voyage with you on board. The crew are whispering that you may be the reason. Is this true?"

traits.locale_text: "Aramıza katıldığında yaptığımız ilk öteboyut yolculuğunda günahkârlık dolu tuhaf şeyler olmaya başladı. Mürettebattan tüm bunların nedeni olduğuna dair fısıltılar yayılıyor. Haklılar mı?"
